item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

yeah i added it, and it wont drop anything :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 08:26:08 pm[/size][hr]this is what i added;

[code]public static int randomHero[] = {995 15000, 995 13000, 995 7000};

public static int getHeroDrop() {
return randomHero[(int)(Math.random()*randomHeroDrop.length)];
}[/code]

then lower down i added;

if (n2.npcType == 21) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(NpcDrops.getHeroDrop(), 1, n2.absX, n2.absY, p.heightLevel, p.username); }

Read full topic
